Header: More houses constructed under Api Wenuwen Api handed over to war heroes families
Content: 96 homes constructed under the 'Api Wenuwen Api' initiative in the Rathnapura District were handed over to the families of war heroes today by President Mahinda Rajapaksa. During a function which was held at the Ahaliyagoda Mihindu Maha Vidyala today President Mahinda Rajapaksa also handed out household appliances to these families. At present 10 'Api Wenuwen Api' ' programmes have been successfully completed in the districts of Monaragala, Kurunegala, Kandy & Polonnaruwa. Moreover school equipment kits were handed over to the students of the Ahaliyagoda Mihindu Maha Vidyalaya by President Mahinda Rajapaksa.
